name: When the Clock Strikes Midnight
description:
[Currently unfinished, might be completed in the future]

This is a first person adventure game, where the player can move around a small town, examine it, and talk to its inhabitants. 

The player’s objective is to find out who in the town is a monster, and find a way to get rid of them before the twelfth bells ring. 

Time advances in real time, with each in-game hour correlating to a minute. Each playthrough will hence be limited to twelve minutes.
